fieldGroup.template: Participating in a research activity can involve risks, and that is why the University has Civil Liability Insurance that covers damages derived from such professional activities.

In human beings, civil liability insurance does not cover damages that may occur in research if it is a clinical trial (LIB 14/2007), if the research staff is not part of the University or if the research activity does not have the report. favourable of the CEI.
